thread.title: Lafayette police: Train kills 61-year-old Lafayette woman
thread.title_full: Lafayette police: Train kills 61-year-old Lafayette woman - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Lafayette police: Train kills 61-year-old Lafayette woman
text:
LAFAYETTE, La. (AP) - Lafayette police say a 61-year-old woman has died after being hit by a train.
Investigators say a westbound train hit Angela Tolliver of Lafayette as she crossed the tracks at West Third Street about 7:30 a.m. Saturday.
Police said Sunday morning that she had died at an area hospital.
